alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 8:27AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Poinsett and southwestern Mississippi Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 827 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marked Tree, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Lepanto, Tyronza, Joiner, Dyess, Bassett, Birdsong, Whitton, Dimple, Creamery Package, Shawnee, Evadale, Beasley, Dub, Wardell, McClendons Corner, Spear Lake, Chelford, Norden and Bardstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
